 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָבֵן‎</span>] **verb** ==be white== (on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ֵ֯‎</span> see [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>NB 166</sup>; [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 33</sup>, compare 53, 54 infers <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָבֹן ֗֗֗ ‎</span> from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבֹנָה‎</span>; Late Hebrew ***id.***, Pi\`el Hiph\`il, and derivatives; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לבן‎</span> ***white***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***milk***; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> also ***be white***, dialect of Yemen, Maltzan<sup>ZMG xxvii, 1873, 247</sup>; apparently √ of following fourteen words, but this dubious especially in case of II. III. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָבָן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבָנָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִבְנָה‎</span>, II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבוֺנָה‎</span>, I. II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִבְנִי‎</span>); — 

**Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִלְבִּינוּ‎</span> [[Joel.1.7|Joel 1:7]] ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַלְבִּין‎</span> [[Ps.51.9|Ps 51:9]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַלְבִּינוּ‎</span> [[Isa.1.18|Isa 1:18]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְלַלְבֵּן‎</span> (= <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּלְהַלְבֵּן‎</span>) [[Dan.11.35|Dan 11:35]] — 

**1.** ***make white*** = purify (ethical) [[Dan.11.35|Dan 11:35]] (no object expressed, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָרַף‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּרֵר‎</span>). 

**2.** ***shew whiteness, grow white***, of fig-tree, stripped by locusts, [[Joel.1.7|Joel 1:7]] figurative of moral purity, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּשֶּׁלֶג יַלְב‎</span> [[Isa.1.18|Isa 1:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשֶּׁלֶג אַלְב‎</span> [[Ps.51.9|Ps 51:9]]. **Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְלַבְּנוּ‎</span> [[Dan.12.10|Dan 12:10]] ***be purified*** (ethical, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְבָּֽרֲרוּ‎</span>). — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָבַן‎</span>, ***make brick***, see below 



 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָבַן‎</span>] **verb denominative** ==make brick== (as Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***labânu***</u></abbr> from***libittu*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 370</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 1 plural<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִלְבְּנָה‎</span> [[Gen.11.3|Gen 11:3]] (with accusative of congnate meaning with verb); ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִלְבֹּן‎</span> [[Exod.5.7|Exod 5:7]] (with accusative of congnate meaning with verb), v[[Exod.5.14|Exod 5:14]] (absolute)
